item.description:
EVENT: Historical walking tour of Mount Auburn Cemetery. Come enjoy the beautiful and serene views with a chance to learn about some of the lives of prominent Bostonites from the past. Then we will go for some Coffee/tea and good conversation afterwards.

Trip Coordinator: Heather (heather925@rcn.com)
MEET: 1pm. meeting area will be given out when you rsvp(rain cancels)
RSVP: Required by October 15th, use the email address above and include a cell phone number for contact on the 16th.
COST: There is a $5 charge for nonpaid members and Mosaic guests
item.how_to_find_us: Heather will make arrangements when you rsvp

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: Walk at Mount Auburn Cemetery
